dt: {bc}incapable of giving coherent, clear, or effective expression to one's ideas or feelings
{bc}incapable of speech especially under stress of emotion {bc}{sx|mute||}
{bc}uttered or formed without the definite articulations of intelligible speech

et: New Latin {it}inarticulatus{/it}, from Latin {it}in-{/it} + New Latin {it}articulatus{/it} articulate
dt: {bc}relating to, characteristic of, or being an inarticulate or its shell

et: Late Latin {it}inarticulatus{/it}, from Latin {it}in-{/it} + {it}articulatus{/it}, past participle of {it}articulare{/it} to utter distinctly {ma}{mat|articulate|}{/ma}
shortdef: incapable of giving coherent, clear, or effective expression to one's ideas or feelings
incapable of speech especially under stress of emotion : mute
incapable of being expressed by speech
